最多只能同时有3条未审核提现记录: You can only have a maximum of 3 pending withdrawal records at the same time.

贷款额度与客户信用分和资产存在关系: The loan limit is related to the customer's credit score and assets
统称为各方: Collectively referred to as the Parties
(生效日期)签订 由以下各方: (Effective Date) Signed by the following parties
双方约定的利率为: The interest rate agreed by both parties is
借款人同意偿还贷款人: The Borrower agrees to repay the Lender
借款人未能按时还款的，借款人应缴纳滞纳金: If the Borrower fails to repay on time, the Borrower shall pay a late payment fee
借款人提前还款不会受到任何处罚: The Borrower will not be subject to any penalty for early repayment
借款人未能按时还款的，借款人应立即偿还全部未偿还本金和利息 无需通知或要求: If the Borrower fails to repay on time, the Borrower shall immediately repay all outstanding principal and interest without notice or request
若借款人未能按时履行还款义务，借款人同意承担由此产生的一切费用。 贷款人在催收过: If the Borrower fails to fulfill its repayment obligations on time, the Borrower agrees to bear all expenses incurred thereby. Lender in the collection process, including but not limited to attorney fees
如果本协议的任何条款被发现无效或无法执行，则该条款应作废， 但所有其他规定仍然有: If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be void, but all other provisions shall remain valid and binding
本协议对双方具有法律约束力，可在联合国境内签署和执行 国家和欧洲。双方声明有权签: This Agreement shall be legally binding upon the parties and may be signed and enforced in the United States and Europe. The parties declare that they have the authority to enter into this Agreement
根据本协议条款，公司应以货币形式在账户中支付 平衡。双方均有权签署本协议。任何一: According to the terms of this Agreement, the Company shall pay in the form of currency on the account balance. Both parties have the authority to enter into this Agreement. Neither party shall infringe upon the rights of a third party or violate any other agreement between the parties
本协议应根据所在国家的法律解释和执行 借款人所在地: This Agreement shall be interpreted and enforced in accordance with the laws of the country where the borrower is located
本协议资金由第三方银行贷款机构提供，所有提供的资金必须由本人尝还: The funds for this Agreement are provided by a third-party bank lending institution, and all funds provided must be repaid by the borrower
双方同意以上条款并签字如下: Both parties agree to the above terms and sign as follows
(按日计算)这应被视为处罚而不是罚款: (Calculated on a daily basis) This should be considered a penalty rather than a fine

请勿上传于姓名不符的证件照: Do not upload ID photos that do not match the name
NFT是区块链上代表媒体所有权与真实性的数字记录。: NFT is a digital record on the blockchain that represents the ownership and authenticity of media.
NFT不仅是一个多媒体文件（如Gif.或Jpeg.），—它也是一个公共记录，包含: NFT is not just a multimedia file (like a Gif. or Jpeg.) — it is also a public record that contains historical information associated with the media. In this case, NFT is more like a list of ownership and a certificate of authenticity for the painting.
NFT不同于可替换的资产，如20美元的钞票、股票或其他单位，它们可以相互替换而不: NFT is different from fungible assets, such as $20 bills, stocks, or other units, which can be replaced with each other without changing value.
不同于一张20美元可被替换成另一张20美元，NFT的独特品质，使每个NFT都是独: Unlike a $20 bill that can be replaced with another $20 bill, the unique quality of NFTs makes each NFT unique and this uniqueness can be verified.
NFT作为所有权证明，以高度防篡改的方式，数学验证某个区块链地址是否拥有该项目。: NFT acts as proof of ownership, mathematically verifying that a blockchain address owns the item in a highly tamper-proof way.
NFT还可以作为真实性证书，确保任何形式的媒体（艺术品、文档或其他数字文件）都可: NFT can also serve as a certificate of authenticity, ensuring that any form of media (artwork, document, or other digital file) can be traced back to its origin (to prove that it has not been tampered with from the source).
拍摄博物馆中的艺术品并不会使摄影师成为这幅画的所有者，拍摄的图像也无法成为艺术品: Photographing a work of art in a museum does not make the photographer the owner of the painting, and the image taken cannot become the artwork itself.
我们之所以知道这一点，是因为策展人、学者、收藏家与公众在原件，复制品以及合法所有: We know this because curators, scholars, collectors, and the public have reached a consensus on the subject of originals, copies, and rightful owners.
NFT也是如此，NFT上的原件具有可证明的稀缺性和价值， –而不是右键单击保存的: The same is true for NFTs, where the original has provable scarcity and value – not a right-clicked copy – but rather than relying on individual judgment to verify authenticity or ownership, NFTs leverage the consensus-building power of blockchain technology.
简而言之，NFT以客观的数学证明来验证所有权与真实性，而不是对个人或组织的主观信: In short, NFTs verify ownership and authenticity with objective mathematical proof, rather than subjective trust in an individual or organization.
尽管区块链的借贷服务才刚崛起，但NFT在区块链技术的最早年代就已经出现。: Although blockchain lending services are only just emerging, NFTs have been around since the earliest days of blockchain technology.
NFT的概念是于2012年在Colored Coins中被引入。Colored: The concept of NFTs was introduced in Colored Coins in 2012. Colored Coins were stored on the Bitcoin blockchain and provided a way to represent ownership of real-world assets, such as real estate or stocks. A few years later, digital artist Kevin McCoy minted the first widely known NFT with a "Quantum" – an octagonal dynamic work on the Namecoin blockchain.
在基于比特币的Counterparty平台开始病毒式流行Rare Pepes这样: After the Bitcoin-based Counterparty platform began virally popularizing collectibles like Rare Pepes, Ethereum advanced NFTs in 2018 with CryptoKitties and the ERC-721 standard. This paved the way for other smart contract-enabled blockchain networks like Solana, Polygon, and Tezos, which helped NFTs achieve further adoption and circulation.
迄今为止，NFT已被广泛地使用于查询数字艺术以及收藏品的所有权和真实性。一些早期: To date, NFTs have been widely used to query the ownership and authenticity of digital art and collectibles. Some early NFTs, such as CryptoPunks, saw a shift in the concept of ownership, which was also a cultural shift. NFTs also have use cases for decentralized ownership in areas beyond art, from sensitive financial document verification to exclusive access to pop culture experiences, which continue to grow.
几乎所有数字文件都可以成为 NFT，但如今最常见的用例是可收藏的数字艺术品。在: Almost any digital file can become an NFT, but the most common use case today is collectible digital artwork. Before the advent of NFTs, the most serious criticism of digital artworks or collectibles was that it was nearly impossible for people to query the ownership of art or baseball cards online, which required heavy reliance on intermediaries and made people vulnerable to fraud.
NFT使数字艺术进一步合法化，成为现代文化的一种媒介和有价值的表达方式。“蓝筹”: NFTs further legitimize digital art as a medium and valuable form of expression in modern culture. "Blue chip" NFTs (such as works by digital artists such as CryptoPunks, Bored Ape Yacht Club, and Beeple) have set sales price records not only for NFT marketplaces, but also for traditional art auction houses.
许多NFT系列为其持有者提供独特的现实福利、奖励或体验，创造额外的价值。: Many NFT collections offer unique real-world benefits, rewards, or experiences to their holders, creating additional value.
那些持有NFT特定收藏品的人们经常互相联系，培养关系，以及分享他们对项目的热情，: Those who hold specific NFT collections often connect with each other, cultivate relationships, and share their passion for the project, which also gives them a deeper sense of community membership.
此外，一些去中心化的自治组织（DAO）会集合在一起，分享他们认为具有文化意义的课: In addition, some decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) come together to share topics they believe are culturally significant, such as fractional ownership and collective management of NFTs.
音乐家们正利用NFT减少唱片公司及更广泛的音乐产业的影响，帮助艺术家们调解与量化: Musicians are using NFTs to reduce the influence of record companies and the broader music industry, helping artists mediate and quantify their relationship with fans. Just as unique images can be put on the blockchain as NFTs, unique audio clips can also be created, traded, and stored on the blockchain as NFTs for fans to own and enjoy.
包括Kings of Leon以及3LAU在内的数十位跨流派和跨时代的音乐艺术家: Dozens of music artists across genres and generations, including Kings of Leon and 3LAU, are using NFTs to foster new music experiences and offset their reliance on music industry intermediaries.
基于区块链的平台，如Decentraland、Axie Infinity以及Th: Blockchain-based platforms such as Decentraland, Axie Infinity, and The Sandbox use NFTs to provide players with unique gaming experiences and reward them with items of real value. In these games, NFTs can represent virtual land, characters, abilities, or wearables with different attributes and market values. NFTs are the original cryptocurrency in blockchain games, which are a key part of the game economy and can also be used to reward players with items of real value for their in-game achievements. NFTs give players control over their in-game achievements and receive customized rewards with real value.
NFT也拥有与去中心化金融（DeFi）协议相关的创新用例，作为一种在没有中间商的: NFTs also have innovative use cases related to decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols as a way to keep ownership unaltered without middlemen. Important financial documents, such as proof of ownership of a piece of land or a business' tax declaration, can be created as NFTs and used in decentralized finance protocols to reliably execute peer-to-peer blockchain transactions. In addition to proof of ownership and authenticity use cases, NFTs can also be used as collateral for loans. Both traditional lending services and blockchain-based lending services are exploring how to use the value of NFTs to fund new financial products and services.
NFT正迅速成为下一代互联网的基本组成部分，通过NFT特有的所有权属性可以提供更: NFTs are quickly becoming a fundamental component of the next generation of the Internet, providing a more immersive online experience through the unique ownership properties of NFTs.
NFT有潜力让基于区块链的互联网架构更加去中心化与匿名化，通常被称之为Web3。: NFTs have the potential to make blockchain-based Internet architecture more decentralized and anonymous, commonly referred to as Web3. NFTs have shown great potential in these areas and have the opportunity to play a key role in the subsequent development of Web3 and the Metaverse. Many believe that art is just the first of many fields to be revolutionized by NFTs, and other use cases such as e-commerce, land ownership and even personal identity will soon emerge.
出席证明协议（POAP）是一个开源项目，使用NFT来追踪现实活动的参与情况。在提: The Proof of Attendance Protocol (POAP) is an open source project that uses NFTs to track attendance at real-world events. After providing a simple badge design and metadata related to the event (such as the event name, location and date), POAP can be distributed to create a tamper-proof digital attendance record that is easy to share and verify.
POAP使活动组织者能够为其社区提供更加个性化的体验。这种类型的非同质化代币还有: POAP enables event organizers to provide more personalized experiences for their communities. This type of non-fungible token also has the potential to expand into other areas, such as querying and tracking certificates from academic institutions and professional organizations.
从奢侈品牌到快时尚强国，世界各地的公司正在探索NFT的力量。: From luxury brands to fast-fashion powerhouses, companies around the world are exploring the power of NFTs.
一些著名的品牌正在推出适合元宇宙的NFT服装系列，而其他品牌，如Louis Vu: Some well-known brands are launching NFT clothing lines suitable for the metaverse, while others, such as Louis Vuitton, are developing brand collection games for NFTs.
NFT 加深了与客户的联系，同时将焦点放在鼓舞人心的新艺术家身上。Gucci、D: NFTs deepen connections with customers while putting the spotlight on inspiring new artists. Gucci, Dolce & Gabbana, Nike, and Adidas are among the fashion icons who use the power of NFTs to create and lead new trend experiences.
